NOTES ON GITHUB MERGING ISSUES


fixed git merging issues
-- after 2fa, need to use personal tokens generated by github, not pw, when pushing 
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29297154/github-invalid-username-or-password

-- after security updates to not show email, need to set global push email to github's masked email version
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43863522/your-push-would-publish-a-private-email-address-error

-- also some strangeness of ssh vs git when setting up initial repo but not difficult
